content: वर्धापनं [वर्धं छेदं करोति, वृध् णिच्-आप् च ततो भावे ल्युट्] {@--1@} Cutting, dividing. {@--2@} Cutting the umbilical cord, or the ceremony connected with this act. {@--3@} A festival on a birth-day. {@--4@} Any festival in general when wishes for prosperity and other congratulatory expressions are offered; <ab>cf.</ab> पूर्णपात्र.
